name: BREAK IT! (Demo)
description:
A game about breaking things, inspired by the classic game Brick Breaker. You play as Blorm, a bouncing screen saver icon that recently became sentient and aware of his entrapment within the computer. He doesn't know who he is, he doesn't know why he's there, all he knows is that he... must BREAK IT!

HOW TO PLAY:

Complete each level by breaking every brick within the level. Bricks can only be destroyed by bouncing Blorm against them. Shoot a Blorm Blast to change Blorm's direction or to destroy enemies. Complete the level as quick as possible with as few Blasts as possible in order to maximize points!

CONTROLS:

-Shoot a Blorm Blast: Left Click

-Pause Game: ESC
